token = TEST_TOKEN
user = TEST_USER

[noaa]
api_url = https://api.weather.gov/alerts

[user_agent]
app_name = NOAA-Alerts-Pushover-Test
version = 1.0
contact = test@example.com

[events]
ignored = Red Flag Warning,Heat Advisory

[schedule]
fetch_interval = 5
cleanup_interval = 24
vacuum_interval = 168
